website_summaries.verdict: The HP OfficeJet 4315 does it all, but does it slowly and not very well. It's a decent choice if you need a cheap all-in-one on hand for those "just in case" moments, but if you print even semiregularly, you're better off spending a little bit more for a better all-in-one printer.

customer_reviews.title: No Automatic Ink Head Cleaner
customer_reviews.text: Since I don't print things out very often, the ink heads gummed up the printer, now it won't work. Love all the features. Love the small foot-print (doesn't take up very much room) Easy to use, with a comprehensive (easy to understand) user's guide. I just wish it would clean the heads automatically like my husband's printer does (his is always ready to to the job, regardless how much time passes in-between uses). If you need a printer at least a few times a week (not heavy duty office use), I wouldn't hesitate to recommend this unit. Just didn't work out for my occassional need to print out a page or two a month.
customer_reviews.author: MillwrightWife

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a while
customer_reviews.text: I have had this printer for about 2 years and then suddenly I started getting error messages like the paper was jammed when there was no jam. Lately it has been non-functional since I keep getting the message that the carriage can't move and that I should clear the obstruction. Of course there is no obstruction. The ink gauge is inaccurate but I have gotten use to it. I can get weeks or months of printing done after the low ink message comes on. The fax is temperamental at best. I guess I should be happy that it lasted 2 years. I am looking for a replacement .
customer_reviews.author: yogacalypso

customer_reviews.title: Small, dependable. easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned an earlier model of this printer/scanner/fax and it lasted more than 3 years before it went bad, which, I am told, is a good run for such an inexpensive item. I prefer this to a flatbed scanner type. For a small home office it is perfect and easy to use. It has settings for better printing, like photo work, which looks ok. I was unable to find this printer/fax at any local stores. My last one was from Coscto, for $130. So, I was amazed at the omline price of 89.99 with no tax and no shipping, delivered to my door. Yea!Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Machince
customer_reviews.text: Great Machine. I set it up in over a hour, remember to install software first do not connect the unit unit the software says so. I sent my first fax, very easy to do. It goes 6 times faster than my last hp printer (HP 712C) But there is still life in it and will be moving it to the living room computer. It scans, copies, prints, and faxes. All for $75.00. (Plus cost of cable $6.00) Amazon you all are great! I am back in the job market and employers want you to FAX your documents. This does the job, is easy to use I am very pleased. Home Run!
customer_reviews.author: Mark Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Died quickly
customer_reviews.text: Within three months of moderate to light use there were error messages flashing on the screen of this unit and the printer was inoperable. I went through the time and expense of buying head cleaner products and replacing ink cartridges, per the advice of HP customer service, but the printer would simply not work. The scanner does work. Customer service told me it is not under warranty which I have not been able to comprehend. I gave up and bought Cannon model that I had earlier avoided only because of its bigger footprint.
customer_reviews.author: S.J. Häsler

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer 4315 All In One
customer_reviews.text: This is the third 4315 that I have bought in recent months. The first was recommended to me by a co-worker so I bought it for a client. Then the client was so in love with it that they bought an additional one, and then I bought one for my husband as well. Installs fast, works great, the software is simple and flawless, the replacement cartridges are reasonably priced and the quality is perfect for a desktop unit. Love the scanning software with the automatic feed. I was really tired of the flat top scanners.
customer_reviews.author: Diane P. Krause

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfectly great machine. It does everything well. The only objection I have about it is that after six years the feeder begins to break down. But six years these days is a long time for a reasonably priced machine to function. I would recommend it to anyone who wants a reasonably priced three-in-one function machine.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy

customer_reviews.title: Great for a home office!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality all in one printer. Perfect for saving some space in home offices.
customer_reviews.author: TOG

customer_reviews.title: The Mystery Fax Machine
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for only the fax function. It was cheaper then other just fax machines. The Mystery was how many pages of a fax I sent would actually arrive. If I sent a 5 page fax 3-4 pages may actually arrive. Sometimes all of the pages might arrive and the machine would print out an error notices. I contacted Amazon Customer Service and they sent a replacement machine in under 24 hours. (Have to love that about Amazon) That machine had the same problem and was also sent back. I went to Office Depot and bought a Brother Super G3. It works great and my faxes are no longer a mystery. So much for cheap fax machines
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: as conan says "good for the money"
customer_reviews.text: The product is easy to use but if you are using it on a desktop it takes up a lot of room,not in its foot print but in the space it takes when the leaves are open for the feeder and the printed pages. Printing speed is slow and the ink carts are used up quickly. If you are not a frequent faxer it's fine and you dont need many copies as well. This machine is meant for light use not an office machine.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey gold

customer_reviews.title: HP Officejet 4315 All-In-One Printer
customer_reviews.text: I had a printer like this at work and my work got rid of all the desktop printers. I liked it so much I bought one just like it and it has worked without problem for over eight years. Seller had it shipped and delivered on time. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fitzpatrick

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly inexpensive, works as advertised, Mac compatible
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this multifunction machine mainly as a printer, with a need for occasional FAX transmission. It was simple to set-up, prints quickly and clearly, and settings can be changed easily on the front panel. The one disappointment was lack of operability through the USB port of our AirPort. I know that it's inexpensive because the supplies are expensive, but the price was still half of many similar models, and it is more attractive and compact.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wittenberg

customer_reviews.title: Excellent moderately priced All-in-One Printer -- the best!
customer_reviews.text: The HP Officejet 4315 is an excellent All-in-One Printer-Fax-Scanner-Copier. This is the second such printer I have purchased. The first was purchased approximately two years ago and I've never had a days problem with it. The second printer recently purchased on October 3, 2010 is also excellent. Try it--you'll love it!
customer_reviews.author: GLong

customer_reviews.title: No More Running to the Copy Shop
customer_reviews.text: I was running to Office Depot to make copies and send faxes, and paying their high prices, not to mention the time it took me. I finally decided to get this printer, and I'm so glad I did. It was really easy and quick to set up. It works great!! What I also like is that the printer cartridges are affordable. I got rid of another printer because the cartridges cost more than the printer itself. This printer truly does it all and does it well. It's a real workhorse. It meets the high standards of HP for reliability. The only drawback is the LED display is hard to read. I feel this printer is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: L. Brandis

customer_reviews.title: Compact printer
customer_reviews.text: Takes up little space. Produces clear concise copies. Makes a lot of noise. Cartridges sometimes get stuck after printing and have to open printer or turn off computer to get them to work again. Cannot copy books because it does not have a flatbed. Good for light use, but I wouldn't buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing printer for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great printer for the price with super features. I used it recently to copy wallet-sized pictures and enlargen them - they still printed out in a high-quality resolution. Be sure to pick up the printer cartridges when you buy it as the ones they include are "trial" size and will not last long.
customer_reviews.author: Karen H.

customer_reviews.title: HP Officejet 4315 All-In-One
customer_reviews.text: As usual, and especially in the field of printers, HP provides a superb product, which produces absolutely quality results. The setup of this machine is incredibly simple. Also, I would be remiss if I did not mention the fantastic price of $54.98 I paid by purchasing it on Amazon.com.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis A. Denton

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a snap to set-up and use. Much more compact than my previous printers. I have not tried the scan feature yet but faxing, copying and printing have been simple. I bought it based on the customer reviews on Amazon and felt obligated to add my own comments. No complaints at all. I am very satisfied with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Ed T.

customer_reviews.title: Great all around device
customer_reviews.text: it works great and is definitely one of the best multi-functions for the money out there. My only 2 complaints about it is 1. There isn't an obvious way around installing the bundled HP software 2. The scanner is document-fed, not flatbed. Despite those only 2 shortcomings, the printer's exceptional quality and speed as well as the scan quality make this all-in-one a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Busuttil

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU WANT A FAX MACHINE DON'T BUY THIS!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for a fax machine. It to date has only worked once. I had to put one sheet in at a time, because they all go through together. That's bad enough. When I tried to fax today It wouldn't work at all!!!! The printer seems to work ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Rausch

customer_reviews.title: hp officejet 4315 all-in-one
customer_reviews.text: this is the first printer i installed and it worked on the first try. easy to use and no problems so far. i have used it about 2 dozend times and the inkcartdrige is still 3/4 full. I recommend this product and hope, everybody is as happy with it as i am.
customer_reviews.author: magab55

customer_reviews.title: HP officejet 4315
customer_reviews.text: It's a moderately priced printer so that's what I expected, but I was surprised at what a great job this printer did. I have recommended this printer to several friends.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon

customer_reviews.title: HP
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money. Has already failed twice and ink is expensive. I have switched to an Epson and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: E. TAFRA

customer_reviews.title: extremely happy!
customer_reviews.text: I chose to buy this item in conjunction with two other items, on a hunch. The waiting was short, but seemingly long only to me. I was anxious to try it out because an ex-employer swears by HP products/office equipment. Now I see why; it is easy to maintain, all other affiliated products are reasonably priced and easy to find. I would definitely recommend this item to all with a five star rating. I am 100% satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Natividad Rosas

customer_reviews.title: Why Did They Discontinue This Winner?
customer_reviews.text: I L-O-V-E-D this printer. I purchased 3 over the years. Great for home use or small office. I WISH THEY'D BRING IT BACK!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Miles

customer_reviews.title: Great machine for small office!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the HP Officejet 4315 mainly for using the fax capability. So far, that is all I have used, along with the copy feature. I have not had any issues, great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Snyder

customer_reviews.title: One of the best printer/fax/copiers I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me. Thing i loved most...didn't run through the inks like most printers today and prints at a very nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price but won't scan
customer_reviews.text: I can get it to print, I can get it to copy. I can NOT get it to scan. At least the ink cartriges are cheaper than the Lexmark I used to have.
customer_reviews.author: Casey P.

customer_reviews.title: Great price for a fax machine and copier. Not a bad printer.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a fax machine and copier that were independent of the computer and didn't want to spend a lot of money since they won't be used on a regular basis. This was the perfect answer. I am very happy with all of the functions of this machine.
customer_reviews.author: M. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great Printer
customer_reviews.text: I think this printer is great for a small office space. It is a great all in one and the price is just right. It was easy to install for my Mac and prints great copies and photos.
customer_reviews.author: Cali Girl

customer_reviews.title: Love this printer
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this product from Amazon and it arrived well before scheduled date. I was very please. Has a nice small size and perfect for small places. Beautiful print jobs. Just make sure to check the manual for DSL connection. You may need to buy a "Y" connector for DSL hook-up. (I did. Not expensive)GREAT PRICE. Be sure to buy a USB cable if you don't have one. Buy both at Amazon...good deal.
customer_reviews.author: DragonLady

customer_reviews.title: low-end printer
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with it not working, but fax feature wasn't compatible with my DSL service, which is the main reason I bought it. And you can only scan and copy single pages--not helpful if you find something in a book you want to copy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob H.

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive value
customer_reviews.text: First, got delivery (with regular shipping) in less than 24 hours - warehouse must have been just down the street! So, was positively predisposed. Printer and fax set up was simple, sharing existing (VOIP) phone line. Printer is great quality and reasonably fast. Copies are slow enough to discourage heavy use, but convenient for a few copies. Only downside at all? Small ink cartridges - keep spares handy.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy B.

customer_reviews.title: Great little printer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for a great price. Aside from the fact that the USB cable is not included it works perfectly for what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Elamink

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome scanner function.
customer_reviews.text: I would highly recommend this product. I bought it because I needed a cheap sheet fed scanner for legal size paper. I've already scanned over 100 pages and no jams yet. I don't know how it works as a fax or a printer, but the test print seemed to be pretty good. Great cheap sheet fed scanner!
customer_reviews.author: A.F.P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it !
customer_reviews.text: It's small, light, easy to use and does everything I need in my home office....print, FAX, scan and copy. It is missing a flat bed, but that would require a larger and heavier unit so I can get around that deficiency for all the plusses..
customer_reviews.author: Albie Hohauser

customer_reviews.title: Ink is Dear
customer_reviews.text: This fax-printer is easy to use and set up. It has flawlessly printed several hundred document for us. However, given the cost of ink cartridges, the cost per page exceeds by several factors the cost of going to Kinkos, etc. for copies.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: HP Officejet 4315 All-in-One Printer
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the money. Not the fastest, but what do you want for this price!
customer_reviews.author: Steven C. Lawson

customer_reviews.title: bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Needed a all in one printer and didn't want to spend much money. This unit fit the bill to a Tee. I'm very happy with the performance of this printer and for my needs...... It's perfect!
customer_reviews.author: D. Hamer

customer_reviews.title: Less than one star - BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This is a joke...there are constant problems with getting it to print and scan. The only function that works is the fax...so if you want use it solely as a fax, then by all means buy it. The cartridges are used up with a few photos. I had to buy 6 cartridges each color to complete a few photos. A nightmare that I paid for! I will never buy another HP again!
customer_reviews.author: tayloredone

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: I dont think that you can beat this product for the money...i am very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: J. RYAN

customer_reviews.text: I don't know where to start! I have really worked this machine and I still use it! It's been years, I think HP has the greatest products!
customer_reviews.author: James D. Watson

customer_reviews.title: Nice device
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this device for faxing purposes and it works just fine. I must say that the distance between the base and extension is not more than 20 feet. The only issue is the speed of faxing which is slow due to wireless nature of it and that is why I'm giving it a 4 star.
customer_reviews.author: Chimigi

customer_reviews.title: Flawless!
customer_reviews.text: I was really only looking for a replacement for my scanner, since my old one was not XP compatable. After looking at prices, though, I thought - what the heck? I can get a scanner, printer, copier and FAX machine for just a few bucks more! It arrived quickly (as always with Amazon!) and in fine condition. Unpacking was simple, set up was a breeze, and everything checked out fine. No worries, Mate!
customer_reviews.author: Terry J. Trainor

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, bought 2, 1 as gift. The ONLY problem is envelopes may get jammed.
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa's Choice

customer_reviews.title: Good printing
customer_reviews.text: This is a good machine, but why couldn't they include a USB cable, which is required to hook it up to a computer, which is required to use most of the software applications? For this reason, I say three stars on this one.
customer_reviews.author: name

product_meta.title: HP Officejet 4315 All-in-One Printer/Fax/Scanner/Copier (Q8081A#ABA)
product_meta.description:
Package Contents: HP Officejet 4315 All-in-One, HP 21 Black Inkjet Print Cartridge (5 ml), HP 22 Tri-color Inkjet Print Cartridge (5 ml), HP Photosmart Essential software, Setup & Reference Guide, power supply, power cord, phone cord . The HP Officejet 4315 All-in-One delivers excellent scanning, copying, and printing -- all you need for your small or home office. Get ready to print beautiful documents, fax and make copies in black and color, and scan like a pro. The reliable, sheet-fed Officejet 4315 is an ultracompact, four-in-one machine that can turn any room into a business center. 2-line LCD text display 100-sheet input tray; 20-page ADF Supports letter, legal & executive sizes, plus cards Connects via USB port Compatible cartridges - HP 21 Black Inkjet Print Cartridge (5 ml), HP 22 Tri-color Inkjet Print Cartridge (5 ml), HP 27 Black Inkjet Print Cartridge (10 ml) Operating Systems - Windows 98 SE, 2000 (SP3 or higher), Me, XP Home, XP Professional; Mac OS X v 10.2.8, 10.3, 10.4 Unit Dimensions(HxWxD) - 16.75 x 8 x 7 Unit Weight - 8.29 lbs. HP 1-Year Limited Warranty

AMAZON.COM
Amazon.com Product Description Ultra-compact all-in-one that's easy and efficient
The HP Officejet 4315 is a reliable sheetfed all-in-one with print, fax, scan, and copy capabilities--you get the power of four machines in one in an ultra-compact, space-saving solution. Its sleek design with fold-up sheet feeder tray compactly fits almost anywhere, easily freeing up more workspace in your home office. Efficiency is the key with this HP all-in-one. With just the touch of a button you can easily print a family letter, fax a resume to a potential employer, make a quick copy of a receipt, or scan your photos and documents.

 

 



With the HP Officejet 4315 you get the power of four machines in one ultra-compact, space-saving solution. 

Its ultra-compact design with fold-up paper tray makes it easy to store almost anywhere--on a desk, shelf, or table. 

Using HP inks and Hp paper you'll make a bright and bold impression on your audience 

With the touch of a button you can easily print, fax, copy, or scan your photos and documents. Impressive quality for your documents and photos
With the HP Officejet 4315 you'll make a bright and bold impression on your audience with every document or photo you print out. Using HP Thermal Inkjet print technology, the HP 4315 conveniently prints in both color and black-and-white at a speed of up to 20 pages per minute (ppm) in black and 14 ppm in color.  Print resolution with the HP Officejet reaches up to 1200 x 1200 dpi black and up to 4800 x 1200 optimized dpi color and 1200 input dpi. High-quality sheetfed scanning with 1200 x 1200 dpi optical resolution, resolution, 48-bit color. Archived documents maintain text and color quality for decades without fading. Also, with HP Real Life technologies you can automatically remove red eye and enhance detail in dark areas of your photos. 

 Powerful and efficient faxing
The HP Enhanced fax features included memory for up to 200 pages1 plus fax broadcasting to multiple locations, quick and easy faxing with one-touch buttons, and up to 80 speed dials. The HP 4315's powerful plain-paper faxing clock can send out letters at up to three seconds per page in black and color using a 33.6 kbps modem. You can also conveniently copy and send multi-page faxes with its 20-sheet automatic document feeder tray.

 Save valuable time by faxing to a group of people with the touch of a button using broadcast fax feature. The convenient scan-and fax feature lets you scan your documenta into the fax memory so you can walk away with the document and get to work on other projects.




What in the box
HP Officejet 4315 All-in-One (Printer, Fax, Scanner, Copier), HP 21 Black Inkjet Print Cartridge, 5 ml HP 22 Tri-color Inkjet Print Cartridge, 5 ml HP Photosmart Essential software, setup guide, reference guide, power supply, power cord 

Note: USB Cable not included

 1 Based on ITU-T Test image number 1 at standard resolution. More complicated pages or higher resolution will take longer.
feature_bullets: Robust and affordable all-in-one printer, fax, scanner, and copier
Crisp and clear 1,200 dpi black and white print quality; 4,800x1,200 dpi full-color print quality
Copies up to 20 pages per minute
Use only Original HP Ink in your HP printer for great results, print after print
Robust and affordable all-in-one printer, fax, scanner, and copier
Crisp and clear 1,200 dpi black and white print quality; 4,800x1,200 dpi full-color print quality
Copies up to 20 pages per minute

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars158 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
